name: GKGameSessionSharingViewController
desc: A user interface you can use to invite other users into a tvOS game session.

items.name: init(session: GKGameSession)
items.desc: Creates a new sharing view controller for a specified session.

items.name: var delegate: GKGameSessionSharingViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate for the sharing view controller.

items.name: protocol GKGameSessionSharingViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: A protocol you implement to respond to changes to a sharing user interface.

items.name: var session: GKGameSession
items.desc: The game session associated with the view controller.
